Portal is a great game and a personal top favorite of mine. The graphics are very pleasing, the audio is pleasant, and the storyline is very captivating (no pun intended lol) with the whole setting. It's not too easy, but it's not TOO difficult either. It's an especially great game considering when it was made. ğŸ˜„

Once again, amazing game by Valve. The pitty is I did not play it before. The idea of this game is something new and in general it is really catchy and that plot-twist? Damn, who would expect it? Also the, well, monologues are absolutely great and funny (maybe even more in Portal 2) so an award for the one who came up with them. The only sad thing is you're at the end really fast but I think if you are a true fan of HF1 etc. this is something you need to play. And careful - not even the cake is as sweet as it may look like.

2017.12.02

I don't even know why I'm writing a review.
Everyone already knows how great this game is.
But still, I let you know that I love this game too and that one more person on this planet enjoys Portal!

Graphics - 7/10
Bugs - 10/10
Audio - 8/10
Story - 10/10
Game play - 10/10
Co-op - N/A
Grind - 10/10
Worth It - 9/10

Oly Shit

10/10
The cake maybe is a lie
Brain buster at first, then smooth game play. The cake...
Very puzzling, I like it. Also, the Cake is a Lie but please don't leave Hoopy the Hoop to bite the dust of his dreams of being a meme.
JUST BUY IT! Waste ALL of your money for this game so you could use a gun that shoots holes! NOT bullet holes...you get what I mean?
this game makes me hard.
valde makes good games and this is one of them

Probably my favourite game ever made. Sick story, everything is perfect. The voice is a bit annoying and hard to understand for the start but you get used to it real quick. I would give it an 11/10. PS: got this on sale for like a buck, but still would pay $12 for it. Should take around 2-4 hours to beat it. NOW SCROLL UP AND BUY IT!!!

This game is wonderful, great sound and graphics. The game is incredible for the time it was made and still holds up today. The game is pretty short story wise, but if you want to complete everything you can play it for hours upon hours.

Graphics: Not great but for a source game from its time it looks wonderful, no complaints.

Sound: The music was wonderful a joy to listen to and a helpful aspect with playing.

Overall a great puzzle game and worth anyone's time and money, it is fun, intriguing, smart, and funny. On top of all that the ending is amazing and one of the best endings i have ever witnessed.

Short but sweet.

I played Portal 2 before coming back to play this one and it was more of what I was looking for.
The Portal series are great games that require you to solve mini-puzzles using, you guessed it, portals!
This game is unique and it's worth playing if you haven't yet all this time.

8/10

See you on the other side!

It's my third time playing it (last two times pirated, embarrassingly), so it was pretty much a breeze finishing this game. I just realized how short this game was.

Nonetheless, still an absolute masterpiece, and a great transition to Portal 2.

If you love this game as much as I do, play this before you play Portal 2. The story gets better.

Das ist Spielgeschichte!
Muss man gespielt haben.
Good

There is one big reason you should experience this and it's sequel, and no it's not for the cake memes :) 

She is one of the most vile villains ever portrayed in a game. Up there with Satan and Vader, probably the most evil piece of code you will ever encounter in a video game, equally at home running hell with mathematical eficiency and precision, or at Aperture, hiding your cake and taunting you psychologically. And yet, although you'll dispise her and wish her dead, you will cry if you manage to defeat her, I promise. 

Glados is a remarkable villain and you have to experience her for yourself, my words won't ever do her justice. She reminds me of that voice inside all of us, the one that sounds like a mom, but one that knows all your weak spots inside, and she prods at them with a physicians skill. You'll hate her, and you'll love her, and eventually you will miss her.

Not a lot more I can add to all the great things that has been said about this puzzler. And I know I'm sounding like a fanboy, but it's all true. It is indeed superb, this and Portal 2 will always keep a special place in my heart.

I will have my cake Glados, you stupid cow! 9.5/10
